nome: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou: Hobo Mainichi ◯◯! Namappoi Douga

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou: Hobo Mainichi ◯◯! Namappoi Douga
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: Monster Musume: Almost Daily ◯◯! Sort of Live Video
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Anime shorts that offer a secret candid look at the daily lives of Monster Musume. The shorts will update almost every weekday, but each short will be available for 24 hours only. The weekends will have a digest version summarizing the week's videos.

(Source: ANN)
